attributes.action: Make all our police forces around britain carry fire arms NOW at ALL TIMES.
attributes.additional_details:
It's now time as a country to stand up and now realise that we the great british public are on daily alert from major terrorist attacks on our streets that we walk on a daily basis on holiday we take with our families,  football stadiums where we take our kids, schools and colleges, the list goes on and on so please let's all sign and keep our country safe at all times.

KEEP BRITAIN AND OUR KIDS SAFE.
attributes.background: Following the massacre that left 129 dead and hundreds more injured, questions have been raised about how safe British streets are.
